fr.playsoft.android.tools.resource

Class DownloadTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.playsoft.android.tools.resource.DownloadTask

  • public class DownloadTask
extends Object
    Object describing single download task.
    Author:
    Olgierd Uzieblo

    • Constructor Detail

      • DownloadTask

        public DownloadTask(ResourceDescriptor pResourceDescriptor,
            IDownloadFinishedListener pListener,
            int pPriority,
            IFileChecker pChecker,
            int pTaskType,
            IFileCrypter pFileCrypter,
            IURLCreator pURLCreator)
        Creates new download task.
        Parameters:
        pResourceDescriptor - ResourceDescriptor for this task.
        pListener - DownloadFinishedListener to be notified when it is finished.
        pPriority - Priority of this task - the bigger the priority the sooner it will start.
        pChecker - File checker of this task.
        pTaskType - Type of task - large or small file.
        pFileCrypter - Optional file crypter, can be null if file is not encrypted.
        pURLCreator - Optional url creator, can be null.

    • Method Detail

      • setTag

        public void setTag(Object pTag)
        Sets any tag Object.
        Parameters:
        pTag - Tag Object.

      • getTag

        public Object getTag()
        Gets tag object.
        Returns:
        Object that was set with setTag.

      • getListener

        public IDownloadFinishedListener getListener()
        Returns listener used by this download task.
        Returns:
        DownloadFinishedListener of this task.

      • getPriority

        public Integer getPriority()
        Gets priority of this task.
        Returns:
        Priority, the higher the better.

      • getFileChecker

        public IFileChecker getFileChecker()
        Gets file checker of this task.
        Returns:
        File checker instance.

      • getFileCrypter

        public IFileCrypter getFileCrypter()
        Gets file crypter of this task.
        Returns:
        IFileCrypter instance or null.

      • getURLCreator

        public IURLCreator getURLCreator()
        Gets URL creator of this task.
        Returns:
        IURLCreator instance or null.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Object pTask)
        Compares this DownloadTask with another DownloadTask.
        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Parameters:
        pTask - Other DownloadTask.
        Returns:
        True if they are the same = point to the same resource and listener.

      • getNumRetries

        public int getNumRetries()
        Gets number of retries.
        Returns:
        Number of times we tried to download this task.

      • setNumRetries

        public void setNumRetries(int pNumRetries)
        Sets different num retries.
        Parameters:
        pNumRetries - New num retries.

      • restartTask

        public void restartTask()
        Increases num retries and restarts task.

      • getURL

        public String getURL()
        Gets URL of this task.
        Returns:
        URL of this task.

      • getFileName

        public String getFileName()
        Gets result filename of this task.
        Returns:
        Result filename without path.

      • getTaskType

        public int getTaskType()
        Gets type of this task.
        Returns:
        TASK_TYPE_SMALL_FILE or TASK_TYPE_LARGE_FILE

      • isWaitingForStart

        public boolean isWaitingForStart()
        Checks if this task is still not started.
        Returns:
        True if task is not started yet.

      • startDownloading

        public boolean startDownloading()
        Informs this task that download is starting.
        Returns:
        True if it is ok, false if task is already being downloaded.

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()
        Checks if this task is finished.
        Returns:
        True if it has finished.

      • downloadSuccessful

        public void downloadSuccessful()
        Informs this task that download has finished successfully.
